69.heading: Berold, Robert, 1948-
69.title: Vusi Goes Back : a comic book about the history of South Africa
69.author: concept & editorial input, Rob Berold ; research & script, Dick Cloete ; script & artwork, Andy Mason ; lettering, Biddy Partridge.

publication info.publisher: Prezanian Comix in association with the Environmental Development Agency

notes: Summary: From the city of Johannesburg, Vusi goes back to visit his family in a remote area of the Transkei. His grandfather tells him about the history of his people, and Vusi learns that the way he lives today is the result of what has happened in the past. 1. South Africa
History
